title: HR SM use case: New hire onboarding with the onboarding bundle
content:
This use case demonstrates a best practice design that leverages multiple offerings, integrations, and integration scenarios to onboard a new employee and deliver them services. These services are included in a single offering bundle: Employee onboarding bundle.

The following personas are involved in this use case.

Persona Responsibilities
Eve - HR agent Monitors Pete's onboarding process, coordinates the completion of the onboarding paperwork, and closes the bundle request. 
Stephen - Swag kit vendor Prepares and delivers a new hire swag kit for Pete.
Paul - IT agent Prepares and delivers a new PC for Pete.
Mike - Security agent Prepares and delivers an ID badge for Pete.
Pete -New employee Uploads a photo for his ID badge and completes the required paperwork.

Prerequisites

  • You have deployed the HR Content package. The package contains the offering bundle, email templates, and survey that are required by this use case.

    For more information about how to deploy content packages for Service Management, see Content.

  • You have set up an integration with SAP SuccessFactors and configured the following scenarios:

    • Create new SuccessFactors users

    • Create requests for new hires

    For more information about how to do this, see Integration Studio—SAP SuccessFactors integration.

  • You have configured a schedule for the Create requests for new hires scenario. The schedule must run once a day, for example at 12:00 AM. For more information about how to do this, see Scheduler.

  • You have set up an integration with OpenText Extended ECM (xECM) to embed the xECM widget in the Related documents tab of records.

    For more information about how to do this, see Integrate with Extended ECM.

  • You have added images to the Employee Onboarding Bundle Satisfaction Survey (part of the HR Content package). From the main menu, select Build > Survey > Employee Onboarding Bundle Satisfaction Survey. Open the first question (primary survey rating), and then add an image that represents each numerical rating.

  • Pete already has accounts in Service Management and SuccessFactors. Pete's new manager can do this in Service Portal by selecting the Create new employee account in Service Management and SAP Success Factors offering. 

Use case

Step 1: Onboarding process is automatically initiated

Persona
Automated process

Each day, the Create requests for new hires scheduled integration scenario queries SuccessFactors for users who will come onboard in 20 days. 20 days before Pete is due to start work, the scenario adds Pete to a list of new hires, and then creates a request for the Employee onboarding bundle offering bundle for each user on the list.

The Employee onboarding bundle offering bundle automatically creates requests for four child offerings:

  • Request New Hire Swag Kit
  • Request a new PC
  • Deliver a new Badge for a new hire
  • Complete Onboarding Paperwork

Step 2: Swag kit is requested 

Persona
Stephen - Swag kit vendor

Stephen receives an automatically-generated email from Service Management, notifying him to prepare a new hire swag kit for Pete.

As requested, he acknowledges receipt of the request, prepares a new hire swag kit, and sends it for delivery.

Step 3: PC is requested

Persona
Paul - IT agent

The Request a new PC offering automatically reserves a new PC for Pete based on available stock and on his job function and location. If none are available, the task is assigned to Paul.

Step 4: ID badge is requested

Persona
Mike - Security agent

Mike receives an automatically-generated email from Service Management, notifying him to prepare a new ID badge for Pete. He checks the currently available information for the badge, and then contacts Pete to request a photo.

Step 5: Pete provides a photo

Persona
Pete -New employee

Pete sends a photo to Mike.

Step 6: Badge created

Persona
Mike - Security agent

Mike receives Pete's photo and attaches it to the request to deliver a new badge for a new hire. He generates a new badge and updates the request with the badge's number.

Step 7: Swag kit delivery confirmed

Persona
Eve - HR agent
Stephen - Swag kit vendor

Stephen receives an email requesting confirmation that he has sent the swag kit. He replies that he has.

Eve receives Stephen's confirmation, and checks the shipping receipts provided by Stephen. If everything looks good, Eve closes the request for new hire swag kit.

Step 8: PC delivered

Persona
Paul - IT agent

Paul prepares Pete's new PC, and the reservation is automatically closed. Paul then delivers the new PC to Pete, and the request is automatically closed.

Step 9: Badge delivered

Persona
Mike - Security agent

Mike ships the new badge and updates the request to deliver a new badge for a new hire.

When Pete takes delivery of his badge, Mike closes the request.

Step 10: HR shares paperwork

Persona

Eve - HR agent

Eve opens xECM and creates a folder in which she and Pete can share the paperwork that must be completed as part of his onboarding. She uploads the company's business competition agreement, employment agreement, and non-disclosure agreement to the folder.

Back in Service Management, Eve opens the Related Documents tab of the request to complete onboarding paperwork, and adds the node ID of the folder she just created in xECM.

The documents she uploaded are now visible and accessible directly in Agent Interface.

Eve leaves a comment in the request, including a link to the xECM folder and instructions for Pete to upload the signed documents to the xECM folder.​

Step 11: Employee completes and uploads documents

Persona
Pete - New employee

Pete receives an email notification about Eve's comment, and logs in to Service Portal to check the request. He prints, signs, and scans the documents, and then uploads them to the xECM folder.

Step 12: HR reviews the documents

Persona

Eve - HR agent

Eve opens the Related Documents tab of the request to complete onboarding paperwork, and reviews Pete's signed documents. If everything is in order, she closes the request, and then closes the bundle request.

Step 13: Employee receives a satisfaction survey

Persona
Pete - New employee

Pete receives notification that the onboarding process is complete, together with a satisfaction survey about his onboarding experience.
